Welcome to the Ancient World trail
You will discover ancient Egypt, Greece, Rome and England. Learn about the cultures and important people of past millennia. You may find this exhibit on the third floor.
Welcome to the Ancient World Explorer trails
You will explore ancient Egypt, Greece, Rome and England. Learn about the cultures and important people of past millennia. You may find this exhibit on the third floor.
Welcome to the Aquarium trail
Learn about the aquatic world
Welcome to the Aquarium explorer trail
Explore the aquatic world
Welcome to the Bug House trail
Learn about beetles, flies, spiders, scorpions, centipedes and millipedes. There are even live ant and bee colonies! You may find this exhibit on the second floor.
Welcome to the Bug House explorer trail
Explore the world of beetles, flies, spiders, scorpions, centipedes and millipedes. You may find this exhibit on the second floor.
Welcome to the World Cultures trail
Discover traditions and cultures from around the globe and see objects from the Americas, Africa, Asia and Oceania. We have Samurai armours and swords! You may find this exhibit on the third floor.
Welcome to the World Cultures explorer trail
Explore traditions and cultures from around the globe and see objects from the Americas, Africa, Asia and Oceania. We have Samurai armours and swords! You may find this exhibit on the third floor.
Welcome to the Prehistoric trail!
Travel back in time when dinosaurs roamed our planet and explore life-sized replicas of prehistoric predators! You may find this exhibit on the fourth floor.
Welcome to the Prehistoric explorer trail!
Travel back in time when dinosaurs roamed our planet and explore life-sized replicas of prehistoric predators! You may find this exhibit on the fourth floor.
Welcome to the \'Space and Time\' trail!
Take a journey that is out of this world. The free planetarium will take you on a spectacular trip through the Universe. You may find this exhibit on the fifth floor.
Welcome to the \'Space and Time\' explorer trail!
Take a journey that is out of this world. The free planetarium will take you on a spectacular trip through the Universe. You may find this exhibit on the fifth floor.
Welcome to the Liverpool World Museum!
Trail - take on a quiz that will guide you through an exhibit of your choice.
Explorer Trail - tougher than trails, these are not limited to individual galleries and may even take you on a journey of discovery to other local museums!
Scan any of our QR-codes to get more information.
A floor plan detailing all our exhibits and their location within the museum.
Go here for more information on Liverpool World Museum and for help with using this App.

PictureQRQuestionActivity
PictureMultiChoiceActivity
Welcome to Trails

Would you like a more challenging experience whilst you browse the museum? Why not try our app trails. Trails challenge you with a series of questions that make up a trail through an exhibit. Question types include locating and scanning correct QR codes, answering multiple choice questions, locating items based on an image and multiple choice question images - the clues are all within the artefacts and exhibits
To begin please choose a trail area galleries above and have fun!
Welcome to Explorer Trails

FIX ME! Trails offer you a series of questions that make up a trail through an exhibit. Question types include locating and scanning correct QR codes, answering multiple choice questions, locating items based on an image and multiple choice question images - the clues are all within the artefacts and exhibits
To begin please choose a trail area from the above options and have fun!
Welcome to Trails

Would you like embark on a trail of discovery whilst you browse the museum?

Trails take you on a journey of discovery by providing you with a series of questions about the artefacts within an exhibit.

Trails are confined to particular areas, for example, our Ancient Egypt trails are confined to the Egyptian gallery within the larger Ancient World gallery.

Remember, the answers to each trail step are right here just waiting to be discovered.

Score: As you progress through a trail, you will earn points for correct answers. The better your research and discovery, the better your score!

Challenge your friends and family, see who can earn the most points to become the greatest explorer.

Points: Earn points by correctly answering the questions. Getting the answer correct first try will earn you higher points, each successive attempt at a question (up to a maximum of three) will reward fewer points.

When you successfully reach the end of a trail your achievements will be displayed.

Question types include:

Standard questions, search the gallery for the answer and scan its QR code.

Multi-choice questions, can you get the answer correct first time?

Picture questions, locate the answer to the question from a picture clue and scan its QR code.

Multi-choice picture questions, discover the correct answer to the picture question.

To begin please choose a trail area from the galleries above.

Good luck and have fun!

Not for the faint hearted and tougher than normal trails, Explorer trails take you on a longer journey of discovery within the museum while you taking in a variety of exhibits and galleries.

Explorer trails may even lead you to visit other local museums in your quest for the answers (this feature is not implemented in the prototype).

To begin please choose a trail area from the galleries above.

Good luck and have fun!
